E_CONFLICTING_PLUGINS.message: The plugin "{{ pluginName }}" conflicts with the following installed plugins: {{ conflictingPlugins }}

E_PLUGIN_ALREADY_INSTALLED.message: The plugin "{{ pluginName }}" is already installed

E_PLUGIN_NOT_INSTALLABLE.message: The plugin "{{ pluginName }}" is not installable in the "{{ environment }}" environment

E_MISSING_CLIENT_ENTRY_FILE.message: The Radonis client entry file does not exist at "{{ path }}"

E_MISSING_COMPONENTS_DIRECTORY.message: The Radonis components directory does not exist at "{{ path }}"

E_CANNOT_SERIALIZE_MANIFEST.message: The Radonis manifest cannot be serialized. Make sure to only pass data serializable by superjson to components hydrated client-side
